animeDescription: Parody opening for a spin-off of Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica, starring the characters from the upcoming visual novel game SoniComi by Nitro+.This was released by Nitro+ as an April fools' prank, complete with an official website announcing a full TV series.
animeRelated: ['Other: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica', 'Character: SoniAni: Super Sonico The Animation']
animeCharacters: ['Super Sonico', 'Makise, Kurisu', 'Ein', 'Saya', 'Sakihata, Rimi', 'Aoi, Sena', 'Azif, Al', 'Nishijou, Nanami', 'Orihara, Kozue', 'Watanuki, Fuuri']
